timeline.message: Fix(Azure): Separate provider-key in search properties
Fix(Azure): Ensure a default link is provided if no UI link could be extracted from the work item response
Fix(Azure): Separate tracking keys to minimize risk of hitting 255 char limit

timeline.bodyText: Do these reference name need to be as unique as possible? If so, we might want to add synopsys or something to the name as well so that there are no conflicts.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Well yes, but actually no. This is a risk we run, but the reference name is just the context plus a dot prefixed to the name of the field without spaces.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: @jamesrichard91 What are your thoughts? These are user-visible fields, so it will potentially make issues more verbose, but that could be a good thing so that customers aren't confused.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Should we just remove the private method and put the contents in the public one?
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.message: Fix(Azure): Update query for existing work items and fix transition issue
Refactor(Azure): Remove unnecessary nesting of private method always being called with a constant
